# nethoser

<img src="logo.png" style="max-height:200px;" align="left"/>

Networks for [webhoser](https://webhoser.john-coene.com/).

## Example

```{r}
library(nethoser)

data("webhoser")

webhoser %>%
    connect(entities.persons, entities.locations) %>%
    visualise()
```
